definition: Al-Qaeda/same as 基地組織|基地组织
pinyin: Ji1 di4 Kong3 bu4 Zu3 zhi1

definition: erhua variant of 恐怖片[kong3 bu4 pian4]

pinyin: sheng1 wu4 kong3 bu4 zhu3 yi4

sentences.english: They only had time for three people to climb up. Julia climbed up the rope.
sentences.chinese: 更恐怖但是时间紧迫，只容得下三个人爬上来。

sentences.english: Many times a coward before death, death of terror.
sentences.chinese: 懦夫在未死之前，已身历多次死亡的恐怖了。

sentences.english: Why are some people very recreant can still you like to see horror piece?
sentences.chinese: 为什么有的人很胆小可还是喜欢看恐怖片？

sentences.english: But the mystique that surrounded the terrorist chieftain in life is persisting in death.
sentences.chinese: 但是围绕这位恐怖主义首领一生的谜团却并未解开。

sentences.english: In his latest article he lashed into those terrorists.
sentences.chinese: 他在最近一篇文章中严厉抨击了那些恐怖主义分子。

sentences.english: Therefore many officials were killed in his ruling period.
sentences.chinese: 他统治时期法律严酷，造成了人人自危的恐怖统治。

sentences.english: The Death Star was to be an instrument of terror, meant to cow treasonous worlds with the threat of annihilation.
sentences.chinese: 死星是恐怖的工具，用毁灭来恐吓叛国的星球。

sentences.english: Everybody knows that qadaffi was working with the US to route out terror suspects.
sentences.chinese: 大家都知道，卡扎菲和美国合作抓捕恐怖嫌疑人。

sentences.english: Terrorists will not find a safe haven here.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子在这里将找不到安身之处。

sentences.english: Once school-related fears of children was diagnosed, the treatment that given early would achieve better effects.
sentences.chinese: 一旦确诊儿童学校恐怖症，早期予以治疗则疗效较好。

sentences.english: This incident was not terrorist-related and there is no threat to the wider public.
sentences.chinese: 本事件与恐怖分子无关，不会对公众造成威胁。

sentences.english: I strongly believe that the most horrible prison has no ruthless walls and windows.
sentences.chinese: 我确实相信，世界上最恐怖的监狱并没有铁窗和围墙。

sentences.english: This is a terrorist siege of India.
sentences.chinese: 这是印度面临的恐怖包围。

sentences.english: Aleppo is very happy now that the terrorists have been defeated, so I gather.
sentences.chinese: 阿勒颇正为恐怖分子被打败而高兴。

sentences.english: It’s on TV, like watching the movie“Independent day”(ID4) I can’t imagine how many people are working in the building it’s really horrible, I felt sad.
sentences.chinese: 我不敢想象有多少人正在大厦里工作，太恐怖了。

sentences.english: Ore Collectors have secondary abilities that are very effective against Terror Drones.
sentences.chinese: 矿车的第二能力对抗恐怖机器人都是非常有效的。

definition: shiver all over though not cold/tremble with fear/shudder
